rules.match: Rating: users participated in recent 6 months
rules.replace: 评级：最近 6 个月有参与的用户

rules.match: If you are late to register in 5 minutes before the start, you can register later during the extra registration. Extra registration opens 10 minutes after the contest starts and lasts 25 minutes.
rules.replace: 如果您在比赛开始前5分钟前还未报名，您可以在额外的报名期间稍后报名。额外的报名将在比赛开始后10分钟开放，并持续25分钟。

rules.match: Contest will be available for virtual participation when over. Leave this field blank to allow virtual participation at any time
rules.replace: 比赛结束后将允许虚拟参赛。将此字段留空以允许随时进行虚拟参赛

rules.match: Time when final results are available

rules.match: Is it allowed to run contest as virtual after the end
rules.replace: 比赛结束后是否允许虚拟参赛

rules.match: Is it allowed participate in contest out of competition
Are participants allowed to register for the contest themselves
rules.replace: 是否允许参赛者自行报名

rules.match: Can non-registered users and anonyms view contest standings, problems and other statistics
rules.replace: 是否允许未注册用户和匿名用户查看比赛榜单、问题和其他统计信息

rules.match: If unchecked they will view only personal status
rules.replace: 如果未选中，他们将只能查看个人状态

rules.match: The system will automatically adjust time limits for some languages. Recommended for use only for educational purpose.
rules.replace: 系统将自动调整某些语言的时间限制。仅建议用于教育目的。

rules.match: Check it if you want to allow contestants view statements

rules.match: Rating changes for last rounds are temporarily rolled back. They will be returned soon.
rules.replace: 上一轮的评级变化暂时回滚。它们将很快恢复。

rules.match: Reminder: in case of any technical issues, you can use the lightweight website
rules.replace: 提醒：如果出现任何技术问题，您可以使用轻量网站
